# Parts of a C++ Program

---

## Every C++ program has structure

Every C++ program is composed of several standard parts:

- Top Matter - Sets the environment of the program.
- The main function - Actual work performed here.

VIrtually all programs need both parts.

---

## Basic C++ Program

```cpp
// intro.cpp
// Dr. Fowler
// 1/1/26
// CISP360 introductory program.
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int age = 25;
    string name = "Pat Smith";

    cout << "I'm " << name << ", age: " << age << endl;
    cout << "I love to code!\n";

    return 0;
}

```
